segments.text: What channel did you watch last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Channel Two . A TV series was showing on it . The name of the series is Huanzhu Gene
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you feel about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally it's to my appetite . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't think much about it . To me , it's a sheer waste of time
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be too critical . So what's your favorite ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Variety shows and talk shows , I think .
segments.speaker: S1
